title: How to install the Outlook add-in
description: The Signature 365 add-in for Outlook allows users to preview signatures, add signatures to emails so they appear directly below the email being composed, and select an alternative signature if additional signatures have been assigned to them.

title: How to install the Outlook (Classic) agent
description: The Signature 365 Agent for Outlook supports adding signatures to email so signatures appear directly below the email being composed, and for users to select an alternative signature if additional signatures have been assigned to them.
